channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description:
Interop is the Hippocratic Oath for developers.

"First do no lock-in."

Whenever possible make your product interop with products that came before.
item.source:markdown:
Interop is the Hippocratic Oath for developers.
"First do no lock-in."
Whenever possible make your product interop with products that came before.

item.description:
@Tallow_beach @howardlindzon @MylesUdland I don't think there's much of a debate here.

The companies that the visionary here predicts will do transformative things could do those things now, without the supposedly enabling tech, but they don't for the reasons big companies generally don't do transformative things.

@Tallow_beach @howardlindzon @MylesUdland I know about this from decades of experience trying to get big companies to do transformative things, or to try to work around big companies trying to stop transformative things from happening.

@Tallow_beach @howardlindzon @MylesUdland If you want to do something great -- then fucking do it and stop talking about how. it doesn't matter. that's not the hard part.

@Tallow_beach @howardlindzon @MylesUdland ps: the hard part btw is to get people to work together.

@howardlindzon @Tallow_beach interop was in your friend's list of benefits of "web 3."

the features your friend is pushing are plain old garden variety bullshit.
item.source:markdown:
@howardlindzon @Tallow_beach interop was in your friend's list of benefits of "web 3."
the features your friend is pushing are plain old garden variety bullshit.

item.description: @Tallow_beach @howardlindzon also "web 3" didn't invent interop.
item.source:markdown: @Tallow_beach @howardlindzon also "web 3" didn't invent interop.

item.description: Health providers are fighting to protect abortion records as bans expand. https://t.co/LOwTVmEIfe
item.source:markdown: Health providers are fighting to protect abortion records as bans expand. https://t.co/LOwTVmEIfe

item.description: I click a link in Twitter, a rare event, because I was interested and momentarily forgot that, about four paragraphs in, just as they’re getting to the substance, the text fades, and I see I have to subscribe. I try to remember never to click an ESPN link again.
item.source:markdown: I click a link in Twitter, a rare event, because I was interested and momentarily forgot that, about four paragraphs in, just as they’re getting to the substance, the text fades, and I see I have to subscribe. I try to remember never to click an ESPN link again.

item.description: How TikTok Live Became ‘A Strip Club Filled With 15-Year-Olds’. https://t.co/3lNXpoJqzM
item.source:markdown: How TikTok Live Became ‘A Strip Club Filled With 15-Year-Olds’. https://t.co/3lNXpoJqzM

item.description: @Ask_Spectrum The service is still out.
item.source:markdown: @Ask_Spectrum The service is still out.

item.description: @Ask_Spectrum I hate it when big companies assume it’s just an inconvenience when you can’t watch the news and can’t watch a baseball game after a long days work. Your product doesn’t work. More than inconvenience.
item.source:markdown: @Ask_Spectrum I hate it when big companies assume it’s just an inconvenience when you can’t watch the news and can’t watch a baseball game after a long days work. Your product doesn’t work. More than inconvenience.

item.description: Repealing pitch. I’d love to get credit for my contributions. But I don’t know if this is for real. https://t.co/1MOpWX4C4n
item.source:markdown: Repealing pitch. I’d love to get credit for my contributions. But I don’t know if this is for real. https://t.co/1MOpWX4C4n

item.description: https://t.co/9DEbQ1CObw
item.source:markdown: https://t.co/9DEbQ1CObw

item.description: Spectrum is taking a vacation tonight. No baseball or news. I guess no news is good news eh? I bet the Mets win even if I can’t supervise. Didn’t like missing Jeopardy.
item.source:markdown: Spectrum is taking a vacation tonight. No baseball or news. I guess no news is good news eh? I bet the Mets win even if I can’t supervise. Didn’t like missing Jeopardy.

item.description: @Ask_Spectrum — is there a service outage in ulster county, ny?
item.source:markdown: @Ask_Spectrum — is there a service outage in ulster county, ny?

item.description: @dsearls whodat?
item.source:markdown: @dsearls whodat?

item.description: What Is Really Unprecedented Is Trump’s Criminality. https://t.co/kqtUgWq7nu
item.source:markdown: What Is Really Unprecedented Is Trump’s Criminality. https://t.co/kqtUgWq7nu

item.description: @tribelaw "they" can force you to have a child you don't want.
item.source:markdown: @tribelaw "they" can force you to have a child you don't want.

item.description: @apollozac they can have him!
item.source:markdown: @apollozac they can have him!

item.description:
Listen up schmucks.

See this picture of Trump and his buddies from Russia.

That's who he is.

You sure you want that guy to have American secrets in his hotel safe? https://t.co/hHLpNuTrW4

Oh one more thing.

Before you feel any sympathy for the schmuck in the middle, he's the one that appointed the Supreme Court justices that overturned Roe v Wade.

So if you like him, you're supporting the enslavement of human broodmares aka women.

Also I almost forgot -- over 1 million Americans are dead because he botched the response to Covid.
item.source:markdown:
Listen up schmucks.
See this picture of Trump and his buddies from Russia.
That's who he is.
You sure you want that guy to have American secrets in his hotel safe? https://t.co/hHLpNuTrW4
Oh one more thing.
Before you feel any sympathy for the schmuck in the middle, he's the one that appointed the Supreme Court justices that overturned Roe v Wade.
So if you like him, you're supporting the enslavement of human broodmares aka women.
Also I almost forgot -- over 1 million Americans are dead because he botched the response to Covid.

item.description: Andrew Cuomo (remember him?) now just in an instant went into my "schmuck pile." https://t.co/9uHhXl4Dup
item.source:markdown: Andrew Cuomo (remember him?) now just in an instant went into my "schmuck pile." https://t.co/9uHhXl4Dup

item.description: Last night's Better Call Saul was fantastic.
item.source:markdown: Last night's Better Call Saul was fantastic.

item.description: @jeffjarvis I unfollowed him after this stunt.
item.source:markdown: @jeffjarvis I unfollowed him after this stunt.

item.description: I think it's great they searched Trump's house. Now I hope they lock him up. That would be most awesome.
item.source:markdown: I think it's great they searched Trump's house. Now I hope they lock him up. That would be most awesome.

item.description: @AndrewYang FWIW -- this is when I unfollowed you.
item.source:markdown: @AndrewYang FWIW -- this is when I unfollowed you.

item.description: What did Trump have in his safe that the FBI wanted?
item.source:markdown: What did Trump have in his safe that the FBI wanted?
